meanings.definition: Showing great attention to detail or correct behavior.
meanings.sent1: She was very punctilious about keeping her room tidy and organized.
meanings.sent2: The punctilious student always double-checked her work for any mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The punctilious chef made sure every dish was plated perfectly before serving.
meanings.sent4: His punctilious nature extended to even the smallest tasks, making him a reliable employee.
meanings.sent5: The punctilious gardener meticulously pruned each plant to perfection.

meanings.definition: Strictly observant of etiquette or formalities.
meanings.sent1: The punctilious gentleman always held the door open for others.
meanings.sent2: She was punctilious in her manners, always saying 'please' and 'thank you'.
meanings.sent3: The punctilious host made sure every guest had a drink upon arrival.
meanings.sent4: His punctilious behavior at the dinner table impressed his in-laws.
meanings.sent5: The punctilious bride ensured every detail of the wedding was perfect.
